meta.description: (NaturalHealth365) The World Health Organization, also known as WHO, is planning to push billions of COVID-19 vaccines onto the world population.

title: WHO Pushes COVID-19 Vaccines Worldwide
cleaned_text:
(NaturalHealth365) If you’re like a lot of people, you may not be surprised to hear how major vaccine manufacturers are vying to rapidly churn out COVID-19 “solution.” After all, the vaccine industry is posed to profit greatly from this pandemic – even though they’ve already paid out billions of dollars in vaccine injury settlements.

It’s not hard to imagine how spearheading the mass vaccination effort can make for lucrative financial opportunities. And based on a new initiative geared toward their investors, the World Health Organization (WHO) certainly seems to be taking advantage of the situation.

WHO luring investors, using fear tactics to promote the massive production of COVID-19 vaccines

“No-one is safe until everyone is safe.” This is a direction quote from the WHO in their latest document, released June 26, which explains the “Access to COVID-19 Tools (ACT) Accelerator.”

Such foreboding statements seem a bit out of place in official documents like this, but given the amount of fear-mongering we’ve seen elsewhere in the media about COVID-19, we can’t say we’re totally shocked to see it.

According to the WHO, the ACT Accelerator is a program initially launched in April 2020 at an event co-hosted by the President of France, the President of the European Commission, and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. The program intends to promote collaboration between “governments, health organizations, scientists, businesses, civil society, and philanthropists” in order to “speed up the end of the pandemic by supporting the development and equitable distribution of the tests, treatments and, vaccines” for COVID-19, the pandemic illness caused by a new type of coronavirus called SARS-CoV-2

Are we really to believe that world health officials want to “speed up the end of the pandemic?”

The cost for the ACT-Accelerator program is expected to exceed $18 billion. And, the ultimate aim is to disseminate over 2 billion COVID-19 vaccines by the end of 2021.

With this kind of money and reach at stake, it’s no wonder the WHO and its big pharma investors want to keep people ignorant about what they can do to support their immune system. Whatever it takes to make sure the population remains uneducated to protect their investment, right?

At a time when public health officials demand face masks and business closures, you have other options for protecting yourself and your family

So, what can you do, in lieu of just waiting for a vaccine that may or may not be effective and safe? In addition to searching back through some of our natural solutions for boosting immunity, we also encourage you to incorporate these tried-and-true strategies into your family’s daily routine, inspired by the Cleveland Clinic:
• None Eating nutrient-dense whole foods, especially garlic (rich in a compound allicin) and antioxidant/vitamin C-rich options including (organic) citrus fruits, berries, and (dark) leafy green vegetables
• None Managing stress through meditation, deep breathing exercises, and other mood-boosting activities
• None Physical exercise (any kind that you enjoy enough to do regularly – research shows that just 30 minutes of brisk walking can boost immunity)
• None Getting enough sleep (7-9 hours per night – try sleeping in a pitch dark room, since this boosts the hormone melatonin that regulates your biological clock)
• None Using supplements and essential oils, including vitamin C, D, milk thistle, magnesium, zinc, selenium plus lavender and eucalyptus essential oils.

No doubt, there are many wonderful ways to keep your immune system healthy and strong. Post your ideas in the comment section below. And, remember, the best defense against any bacterial or viral infection is a strong immune system.
